data.text:
Roy KNOX was born (date unknown). Parents: Robert Earl KNOX and Molly Ellen MOORE.Rufus S. KNOX was born on 17 February 1858 in Mound Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He died on 30 June 1874 at the age of 16. He was buried in Blue Mound "Burner" Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Jonathan Shields KNOX and Emeline "Emma" FRIZZELL.Ruth Irene KNOX was born on 30 May 1918 in Cameron, Clinton, Missouri. She died on 12 September 2011 at the age of 93 in Hamilton, Caldwell, Missouri. She was buried on 15 September 2011 in Memorial Park, St. Joseph, Missouri. Parents: Robert Earl KNOX and Molly Ellen MOORE.

Spouse: Francis GROOMS. Ruth Irene KNOX and Francis GROOMS were married on 27 December 1942 in St. Joseph, Buchanan, Missouri. Children were: Francis Michael GROOMS, Dr. Paul GROOMS, Steven GROOMS.

Sadie May KNOX was born about 1900 in Missouri.

Spouse: Otto DENKER. Sadie May KNOX and Otto DENKER were married on 13 September 1924 in Blue Mound, Livingston, Missouri.

Sarah J. KNOX was born in 1850 in Livingston Co., Missouri. She died on 25 December 1879 at the age of 29. She was buried in Blue Mound "Burner" Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Jonathan Shields KNOX and Emeline "Emma" FRIZZELL.

Spouse: William W. CAMPBELL. Sarah J. KNOX and William W. CAMPBELL were married.

Stella A. KNOX was born in October 1880 in Missouri. Parents: James Buchanan KNOX and Emma L. BUMGARDNER.Susan A. KNOX was born about 1866 in Livingston Co., Missouri. Parents: Jonathan Shields KNOX and Emeline "Emma" FRIZZELL.

Spouse: Thomas M. FLORENCE. Susan A. KNOX and Thomas M. FLORENCE were married on 15 March 1892 in Carroll Co., Missouri. The bride was of Livingston Co., the groom of Carroll Co.

Sylvia A. KNOX was born about 1873 in Missouri. Parents: Joseph Allen KNOX and Sarah Bell STAGNER.Vinson KNOX was born (date unknown). Parents: Robert Earl KNOX and Molly Ellen MOORE.Walter KNOX was born in 1919 in Blue Mound Twp., Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Harvey Newton KNOX and Sadie Mae PERRY.William KNOX was born about 1914 in Kentucky.

Spouse: Lois MCCLELLAND. Lois MCCLELLAND and William KNOX were married.

William Phips KNOX was born on 18 March 1872. She died on 19 January 1947 at the age of 74 in West Plains, Howell, Missouri. Parents: Francis Marion KNOX and Rhoda Prudence HAYNES.William Shields KNOX was born on 25 August 1820. He died on 7 June 1890 at the age of 69. He was buried in Ballinger, Runnels, Texas. Parents: Robert KNOX Sr. and Joanna SHIELDS.Willie KNOX died on 24 March 1865. He was buried in Blue Mound "Burner" Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Jonathan Shields KNOX and Emeline "Emma" FRIZZELL.Hattie Marie KNUDSEN was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Paul Cox ALLEN. Hattie Marie KNUDSEN and Paul Cox ALLEN were married. Children were: Alberta Maureen ALLEN.

John Paul KNUDSON was born on 27 April 1974. Parents: Robert Paul KNUDSON and Vickie Marlene BURDICK.Robert Paul KNUDSON was born on 23 October 1952.

Spouse: Vickie Marlene BURDICK. Vickie Marlene BURDICK and Robert Paul KNUDSON were married on 18 July 1972 in Hamilton, Caldwell, Missouri. They were divorced. Children were: John Paul KNUDSON.

August KNUEVEN was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Anna . Anna and August KNUEVEN were married. Children were: Eleanor Elizabeth KNUEVEN.

Eleanor Elizabeth KNUEVEN was born on 29 February 1896 in Glandorf, Putnam, Ohio. She died on 13 December 1960 at the age of 64 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: August KNUEVEN and Anna .

Spouse: Hal MYERS. Eleanor Elizabeth KNUEVEN and Hal MYERS were married in 1913. Children were: William A. MYERS, Stella Ann MYERS, Leo Louis MYERS, Steve MYERS, Mary Ellen MYERS.

Spouse: Dr. Harry Leo PHILLIPS. Eleanor Elizabeth KNUEVEN and Dr. Harry Leo PHILLIPS were married in 1940. His obit says marriage was in November 1939. Children were: Lowell H. PHILLIPS, David PHILLIPS, Marilyn PHILLIPS.

Bernadina KNUFF was born on 15 February 1875 in Quincy, Adams, Illinois. She died on 27 March 1954 at the age of 79 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She was buried on 30 March 1954 in St. Columban Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. She was a daughter of Bernard Knuff.

Spouse: Nicholas Bruno SCHOEMIG. Bernadina KNUFF and Nicholas Bruno SCHOEMIG were married on 5 March 1903. Children were: Magdalene "Mary" SCHOEMIG, Bernard Henry SCHOEMIG, Anthony Stephen SCHOEMIG, Rosalie V. SCHOEMIG, John SCHOEMIG.

Amanda Rosa KNUTTER was born on 27 March 1889. She died on 24 February 1981 at the age of 91 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She was buried on 27 February 1981 in Lawson, Ray, Missouri. Parents: Amos Franklin KNUTTER and Lucinda CUMMINGS.

Spouse: Billy Sloan BERTLESON. Amanda Rosa KNUTTER and Billy Sloan BERTLESON were married in 1949 in Liberty, Clay, Missouri.

Amos Franklin KNUTTER was born on 19 August 1847 in Germany. He died on 11 February 1935 at the age of 87. He was buried in Lawson, Ray, Missouri. Parents: Edward KNUTTER and Louisa VINESTROUGHT.

Spouse: Lucinda CUMMINGS. Lucinda CUMMINGS and Amos Franklin KNUTTER were married. Children were: Grace KNUTTER, Amanda Rosa KNUTTER, Mary Effie KNUTTER.

Connie Sue KNUTTER was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Lonnie Dean SILKWOOD. Connie Sue KNUTTER and Lonnie Dean SILKWOOD were married on 4 February 1991 in Lexington, Lafayette, Missouri. Children were: Darrell SILKWOOD, Russell SILKWOOD, Jerry Allen SILKWOOD, Ricky SILKWOOD, Sheryl SILKWOOD, Deanna SILKWOOD, Amanda Rochelle SILKWOOD.

Edward KNUTTER was born in 1812 in Germany. He died on 25 September 1904 at the age of 92. He was buried in Elmira, Ray, Missouri. He was a Civil War veteran.

Spouse: Louisa VINESTROUGHT. Louisa VINESTROUGHT and Edward KNUTTER were married. Children were: John C. KNUTTER, Amos Franklin KNUTTER, Herman KNUTTER.

Grace KNUTTER was born (date unknown). Parents: Amos Franklin KNUTTER and Lucinda CUMMINGS.

Spouse: ATKINS. Grace KNUTTER and ATKINS were married.

Herman KNUTTER was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Dessie Florence TEEGARDEN. Dessie Florence TEEGARDEN and Herman KNUTTER were married.

Herman KNUTTER was born on 6 August 1856 in Texas. He died on 26 May 1924 at the age of 67 in Caldwell Co., Missouri. He was buried in Elmira, Ray, Missouri. Parents: Edward KNUTTER and Louisa VINESTROUGHT.

Spouse: Dessie Florence TEEGARDEN.

John C. KNUTTER was born on 7 June 1846 in Germany. He died on 9 August 1912 at the age of 66 in Caldwell Co., Missouri. He was buried in Prairie Ridge Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri. Parents: Edward KNUTTER and Louisa VINESTROUGHT.Mary Effie KNUTTER was born on 13 August 1895 in Polo, Caldwell, Missouri. She died on 13 August 1972 at the age of 77 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She was buried in Blue Mound "Burner" Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Amos Franklin KNUTTER and Lucinda CUMMINGS.

Spouse: Rolla James "Rollie" PERRY. Mary Effie KNUTTER and Rolla James "Rollie" PERRY were married on 8 November 1927 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. His obit says marriage was on 18 Nov 1927. Children were: Betty Lou PERRY.

Sherry KNUTTER was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Lonnie Dean SILKWOOD. Sherry KNUTTER and Lonnie Dean SILKWOOD were married. Children were: Lonnie Dean SILKWOOD Jr..

Spouse: Bruce HURSHMAN. Sherry KNUTTER and Bruce HURSHMAN were married.

Shuk Ying KO was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Clyde William "Corky" BATYE. Shuk Ying KO and Clyde William "Corky" BATYE were married on 24 December 1970 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri.

Doris Beth KOBBE was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Rissell Lowell CLAMPITT. Doris Beth KOBBE and Rissell Lowell CLAMPITT were married. Children were: Garry Lowell CLAMPITT.

Elizabeth KOBEL was born on 30 June 1762 in Pennsylvania. She died on 28 October 1850 at the age of 88 in Northumberland Co., Pennsylvania. She was buried in Rebuck, Northumberland, Pennsylvania. Parents: Johann Heinrich KOBEL and Katherine .

Spouse: Lenhart KAUFMAN. Elizabeth KOBEL and Lenhart KAUFMAN were married. Children were: Elizabeth KAUFMAN.

Johann Heinrich KOBEL was born about 1741 in Bethel, Berks, Pennsylvania. He died in 1801 at the age of 60 in Pennsylvania. He was buried in Rehrersburg, Berks, Pennsylvania. In 1755, his family was attacked by seven or eight Indians near their home in Bethel Township. His parents and three of his siblings were killed.

Spouse: Katherine . Katherine and Johann Heinrich KOBEL were married. Children were: Elizabeth KOBEL.

Alice KOBER was born (date unknown). Parents: Robert Thomas KOBER and Grace CRONE.

Spouse: DUNCAN. Alice KOBER and DUNCAN were married.

James J. KOBER was born about 1906 in Missouri. James, his sister Anna and their mother Edith were in the Daviess Co. almshouse in 1930. Parents: John KOBER and Edith B. PROUTY.John KOBER was born (date unknown). Parents: Robert Thomas KOBER and Grace CRONE.John KOBER was born in November 1871 in Missouri. He died before 1910 at the age of 39. John was a huckster in Sheridan Twp., Daviess Co., in 1900.

Spouse: Edith B. PROUTY. Edith B. PROUTY and John KOBER were married about 1897. Children were: Marcus J. KOBER, Robert Thomas KOBER, James J. KOBER.

Marcus J. KOBER was born in November 1898 in Sheridan Twp., Daviess, Missouri. Parents: John KOBER and Edith B. PROUTY.Robert Thomas KOBER was born on 18 August 1901 in Gallatin, Daviess, Missouri. He died on 25 January 1940 at the age of 38 in Liberty Twp., Daviess, Missouri. He was buried on 28 January 1940 in Winston Cemetery, Daviess, Missouri. Parents: John KOBER and Edith B. PROUTY.

Spouse: Grace CRONE. Grace CRONE and Robert Thomas KOBER were married. Children were: John KOBER, Alice KOBER, Wilma KOBER.

Wilma KOBER was born (date unknown). Parents: Robert Thomas KOBER and Grace CRONE.

Spouse: Alvin L. YOUTSEY. Wilma KOBER and Alvin L. YOUTSEY were married on 1 June 1943 in Gallatin, Daviess, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Altamont.

KOCH was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Marguerite CLOSE. Marguerite CLOSE and KOCH were married.

KOCH was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Sally B. LOZIER. Sally B. LOZIER and KOCH were married.

KOCH was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Ellen MATCHETT. Ellen MATCHETT and KOCH were married.

Anna Sophia KOCH was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Joseph Richard ST. CLAIR. Anna Sophia KOCH and Joseph Richard ST. CLAIR were married on 3 December 1922 in Jackson Co., Missouri. Bride and groom were of Jackson Co., Missouri. Mrs. Nancy Koch, mother of Anna, gives consent. Children were: Joseph Elwood ST. CLAIR.

Benjamin KOCH was born in July 1863 in Indiana.

Spouse: Mollie . Mollie and Benjamin KOCH were married about 1878. Children were: Della May KOCH.

Christena Judith KOCH was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Gottlieb LANDENBERGER. Christena Judith KOCH and Gottlieb LANDENBERGER were married. Children were: Barbara LANDENBERGER.

Cynthia Caroline KOCH was born on 28 December 1826 in Kentucky. She died on 28 March 1909 at the age of 82. She was buried in Highland Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri. She is also identified as Cynthia C. Koch and Caroline Cook.

Spouse: William LEWIS. Cynthia Caroline KOCH and William LEWIS were married on 28 December 1848 in Kentucky. Their grandson, Harley Barmore, born Dec 1890 in Missouri, lived with Willaim and Caroline in 1900. Children were: Eliza A. LEWIS, Thomas LEWIS, James LEWIS, Lucinda S. LEWIS, Ellen LEWIS, John W. LEWIS, Elvira E. LEWIS, Lydia L. LEWIS, Mary M. LEWIS.

Della May KOCH was born in August 1887 in Daviess Co., Missouri. Parents: Benjamin KOCH and Mollie .

Spouse: David Elmer PULLEN. Della May KOCH and David Elmer PULLEN were married on 31 August 1909 in Breckenridge, Caldwell, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Breckenridge. Children were: son PULLEN, Daniel C. PULLEN.

Frances Anna KOCH was born on 30 January 1868 in Quincy, Adams, Illinois. She died on 1 January 1946 at the age of 77 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She was buried on 5 January 1946 in St. Columban Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: John KOCH and Anna ALBRECHT.

Spouse: Peter Joseph RUPP. Frances Anna KOCH and Peter Joseph RUPP were married on 25 November 1891. Children were: Peter Oscar RUPP, Msgr. Maximillian George "Max" RUPP, Paul Louis RUPP, Angela RUPP, Laura E. RUPP, John Christopher RUPP Sr., Hildegarde RUPP, Bernard Alphonse RUPP.
